name: eleventykit
description: A static website starter kit for the modern web

scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npx @11ty/eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/css/tailwind.css -o dist/style.css -w & parcel watch ./src/pages/admin/admin.js --out-dir dist/admin
scripts.build: rimraf dist && ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true npx @11ty/eleventy && parcel build ./src/pages/admin/admin.js --out-dir dist/admin && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/css/tailwind.css -o dist/style.css --minify

author: Garrett Bland
